name: Vessels (itch) (duzkiez)
description:
Inspired by the poem The Patience of Ordinary Things, the article Jeong and the Language of Friendship, and my own journey of making new friends in London at 44, Vessels is a short interactive fiction made in 3 days featuring household objects, thoughtful sounds, and hidden Radiohead lyrics (turn speakers on for soundtrack).

Controls: Click buttons to progress.

Final Project for Interactive Narrative & Digital Storytelling at Goldsmiths, University of London in May 2022.

Creative Commons CC BY-NC-SA.

Credits

  • Unsplash photos: Dinh Ng, Eranjan, Eric McNew, Jason Leung, JJ Shev, Kyoshi Reyes, Leon Sun, Liz Vo, Mario Mesaglio, Matthieu Joannon, Phil Hearing, Remy Loz, Stanislav Vlasov, Toa Heftiba, Tom Crew.
  • Google Fonts: Abril Fatface, AmaticSC, American Typewriter, Barrio, Raleway.
  • Mixkit music: Classical 6 by JonnyS.
  • Freesound effects: 16H_Panska_Stejskal_David, Airborne80, awaka, Eelke, grey24, hihirex, stwime, Urkki69.
